source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

spells.description: Use: Zoom in on the targeted location.

item.name: Crown of the Icy Blue Rose

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Crown of the Icy Blue Rose

spells.description:
Equip: When damaged below 40% maximum health, scatter 6 mines randomly around you for 8 sec. Enemies who step on these mines will suffer 804,975 Fire damage and be slowed by 70% for 4 sec.

An enemy can only detonate 1 mine per emergency. Can only occur once every 2 min.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Aureate Sentry's Roaring Will

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Strength by 2,811, up to 14,056.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 2 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,557 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Drape of the Dracthyr Trials
